note.p: Education: St John's College, Cambridge. MA

Career: Apprenticed to Fairbairn and Company, Engineers; Lecturer (1866) and Vice Principal (1870), Royal School of Naval Architecture, Kensington; Professor of Applied Mechanics, Royal Navy College, Greenwich (1873-1897)
References: T M Charlton, 'Maxwell, Jenkin and Cotterill and the Theory of Statically-Indeterminate Structures' in NR 1971 vol 26 pp 233-246
